boardgame.name: Sushi Go Party!
boardgame.description: Sushi Go Party!, an expanded version of the best-selling card game Sushi Go!, is a party platter of mega maki, super sashimi, and endless edamame. You still earn points by picking winning sushi combos, but now you can customize each game by choosing _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;agrave; la carte from a menu of more than twenty delectable dishes. What's more, up to eight players can join in on the sushi-feast. Let the good times roll!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;description from the publisher_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: GAMEWRIGHT (GMW419) Sushi Go Party!, an expanded version of the best-selling card game Sushi Go!, is a party platter of mega maki, super sashimi, and endless edamame. You still earn points by picking winning sushi combos, but now you can customize each game by choosing à la carte from a menu of more than twenty delectable dishes. What_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s more, up to eight players can join in on the sushi-feast. Let the good times roll!

For those that don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t know, there was a printing issue with Sushi Go Party! and many editions were shipped with cards of different sizes (it made shuffling a nightmare). After contacting Gamewright, I was able to get a correct copy but not until after I had already gone and purchased one of my own. Long story short, this copy is NIS and straight from the publisher so guaranteed not to have the print defect.
Got given as a gift, but already have a copy! Unopened, tin in good shape. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll wrap it well. £4 delivery Paypal UK Only
